abstract: Syrian Observatory for Human Rights says Syrian government airstrike in suburb of Damascus killed 46 people, including six children; violence in country spills over border into Lebanon and Lebanese Army reports five soldiers were killed.
lead_paragraph: The government attack targeted an insurgent-held area, as Lebanon’s army fought militants near the border.

byline.contributor: Mohammad Ghannam and Hwaida Saad contributed reporting.

snippet: The government attack targeted an insurgent-held area, as Lebanon’s army fought militants near the border.

headline.main: Syrian Airstrike Hits Damascus Suburb, Killing Dozens
headline.print_headline: Syria: Government Airstrike Kills Dozens Near Capital
